short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Salesforce developer and administrator tool to run Apex test classes and view code coverage from the Salesforce UI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Salesforce developer and administrator tool to run Apex test classes and view code coverage from the Salesforce UI.

The Salesforce Test Executions extension is a productivity tool and with its help, you can:

Apex Test Execution:
- Run multiple Apex test classes at the same time after Salesforce login
- Run selected Apex test methods or all test methods of multiple classes at once
- Display test results with pass/fail methods with error and stack trace information 
- Allows you to search classes and methods to easily find classes & methods from the large list
- Maintain history of previous 5 test runs for each org

Code Coverage:
- View all Apex Classes coverage percentage with number of covered and uncovered lines
- View covered and uncovered lines of Apex classes
- View overall code coverage of the Org
- Export Code Coverage details in PDF, CSV, and Excel formats
- Allows you to sort all columns Class Name, Percent, Lines Covered, and Lines Uncovered in ascending or descending order
- Search class name from the list of classes

Quick Run:
- Quickly run Apex test classes and methods by eliminating wait times for queries and loading
- Manually add or remove Apex classes and methods execute
